data.title: Movies (Express)
data.description: An app that provides brief information on a given movie by consuming a movie database API. Responsiveness was created from scratch

data.title: Chat App
data.description: A basic chat application that allows users to send message and location. The app uses socket.io and express to handle the requests. User will be able to join a room from a list of rooms and able to create a room themselves

data.title: Color Palletes
data.description: An interactive palette creator application that allows users to save their favorite color combinations on their machine for future reference

data.title: Dad Jokes
data.description: An application that generates dad jokes from an API. Users will be able to add a like and dislikes to a joke and will be stored on the machine's local storage for data persistence. Make sure you have your sounds on to enjoy reading daddy's jokes!

data.title: Pet Gallery
data.description: A static react application that showcases pictures of dogs and cats who need a home. Also might show their traits and behaviors upon clicking their images. Utilizing 2 APIs to render random dog images and names

data.title: Movies (Nextjs)
data.description: Application that provides brief information on a given movie by consuming a movie database API. This version uses NextJS

data.title: Museum of Candy
data.description: Landing page for a candy company that offers sweets to satisfy customer's sweet cravings

data.title: To-do List v1
data.description: A basic CRUD application using vanilla Javascript and responsiveness was made from scratch

data.title: Weather App v2
data.description: A weather application that displays weather data depending on the user input. It interacts with 2 APIs, one geocodes the input then the other one gathers information depending on the results. It displays 5-day and 7-day forecast.

data.title: DK&O Solutions Hub
data.description: A landing page for a small trading business that focuses on connecting 2 different clients with their business needs. This is one of my friends startup business.

data.title: Mountain Travel
data.description: Landing page for a travel website offering travel packages

data.title: Technical Documentation
data.description: A simple technical documentation page about creating responsive websites from scratch using relative units, flexbox, and grid

data.title: Calculator
data.description: A simple/basic calculator that calculates series of inputs in relation to the previous result

data.title: Matemail Co.
data.description: A landing page for a trading company showcasing their products and their company progress throughout out the years. NOTE: The company owner never saw had a chance to see this version of their current website.

data.title: Patatap
data.description: Patatap is a portable animation and sound kit. With the touch of a finger create melodies charged with moving shapes. My version uses Howler.js for the audio and Particles.js for the dynamic background. Warning: contains flashing images.

data.title: Blog v1
data.description: A blogging application allows a user with confirmed accounts to post blogs. For this one, It is a food blog application

data.title: Blog v3
data.description: A blogging application with a dashboard to manage current user posts and comments. Also features an admin dashboard as well. This one is a travel blog variant

data.title: Dev Camper
data.description: This platform allows users to search for a bootcamp that suits their needs and assets. Features such as search via nearest bootcamps, their offers and prices.

data.title: Warbler
data.description: This is one my first react projects. It also utilizes redux for frontend data store. The original warbler was part of one of the courses the I took, however, I made a bit different to explore what else I can do.

data.title: Lights Out
data.description: Lights Out original game is an electronic game released by Tiger Electronics in 1995. The original game of has a 5 by 5 grid of lights. The goal is to light up all the cells

data.title: Guess The Country
data.description: A game that lets the player guess a country by the given flag. Player is given 10 hearts and given 1 point each correct answer. Before moving onto the next question, a quick trivia will appear and it will show the geographical position of the country. A summary will be given after the game.

data.title: Memory Game
data.description: Sharpen your memory and have fun at the same time by playing this game and listening to the soothing background music.

data.title: Guess The Password
data.description: A game that lets the player guess the password. Hints are going to be provided as the game progresses however, player only has 4 tries to land on the correct password.

data.title: The Great Color Game
data.description: A color guessing game that tests your knowledge about RGB colors. The game is build only with vanilla Javascript however, it is not that fully responsive.

data.title: Note Taking App (CLI)
data.description: A simple command line application that allows users to saves notes on their machine and access it when needed. A deadline is indicated to each notes, so user is reminded when to finish a certain note/task

data.title: Yelp Camp
data.description: A camper application to browse available camps in the country. Reviews and comments and present and use can also upload their own camp for others to see and visit.

data.title: Purrfect
data.description: A header page for a cat day care center

data.title: Hangman
data.description: Hangman is a paper and pencil guessing game for two or more players. One player thinks of a word, phrase or sentence and the other(s) tries to guess it by suggesting letters within a certain number of guesses.
